headline: Ask HN: Added Yubikey to Google account and Chrome clears cookies weekly
description:
Ever since I added a Yubikey to my Google account, Chrome has been clearing all my cookies weekly. I have to login to every single website again and again.

Anyone else experienced this?

I dual boot Linux/Win11 and use profiles in Chrome for work and personal. It clears cookies in all profiles.

I've tried to delete/recreate the Chrome profiles and again login to all websites but the issue persists. Just now it cleared everything again.

The only extension I use is uBlock Origin (with a bunch of whitelisted websites and this list doesn't get erased when the cookies are erased).
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 在谷歌账户中添加了Yubikey，Chrome浏览器每周都会清除cookies。
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 在谷歌賬戶中添加了Yubikey，Chrome瀏覽器每週都會清除cookies。
description_zh-Hans:
自从我在谷歌账户上添加了Yubikey后，Chrome浏览器每周都会清除我所有的cookies。

有人遇到过这种情况吗？

我是Linux/Win11双启动，在Chrome浏览器中使用工作和个人配置文件。它清除了所有配置文件中的cookie。

我曾尝试删除/创建Chrome配置文件，并再次登录所有网站，但问题仍然存在。

我唯一使用的扩展是uBlock Origin（有一堆白名单的网站，这个名单在清除cookies时不会被清除）。
